ar.com.hjg.pngj
Class ImageLine.ImageLineStats

java.lang.Object
  ar.com.hjg.pngj.ImageLine.ImageLineStats
Enclosing class:
ImageLine
public class ImageLine.ImageLineStats
extends java.lang.Object

Computes some statistics for the line. Not very efficient or elegant, mainly for tests. Only for RGB/RGBA Outputs values as doubles (0.0 - 1.0)
